ygData.subject: FW: Dark Elf SK wants to get from Neriak to Crushbone
ygData.msgSnippet: No where is safe at all on the entire continent. ALL NPC s will KOS. Think VERY carefully and long about this undertaking. I went over at level 11, stayed for
ygData.messageBody:
No where is safe at all on the entire continent. ALL NPC's will KOS. Think
VERY carefully and long about this undertaking. I went over at level 11,
stayed for 3 weeks real time and went back. When I went back I had 3 Plat,
no new equipment and I was still level 11. It is VERY hard, even with
friends helping you. It sucks not being able to go to the bank or to a
vendor for provisions.

Sthiel
Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Matthew Bair [mailto:bair@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 2:15 PM
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'; 'eq_shadowknights@onelist.com';
'EQ-Shadowknights@onelist.com'
Cc: Matthew Bair
Subject: [shadowknight] Dark Elf SK wants to get from Neriak to
Crushbone


From: Matthew Bair <bair@...>

I'm a Dark Elf (DE) ShadowKnight (SK) that wants to get from Neriak to
Crushbone to meet a friend. I know the way. My question pertains to
faction standing and KOS. As a DE SK, where can I go safely and where
must I watch out.

Matt
Email: bair@...
